import reactDom from "react-dom"; import React from "react"; import ScrollLock, { TouchScrollable } from "react-scrolllock"; import LIFE from "../assets/LIFE.pdf"; import SECONDCHANCES from "../assets/SECONDCHANCES.pdf"; import THIRDPLACE from "../assets/ThirdPlace.pdf" function Modal(props) { const footnotes = props.links.map((row, index) => { return (
  • {index + 1}. {row[1]}{" "}
    • ); }); return reactDom.createPortal(

    {props.title}

    {props.text}

      {footnotes}
    , document.querySelector("#modal") ); } export default Modal;
